definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: The Eimeria species, causative agents of the disease coccidiosis, are genetically complex protozoan parasites endemic in poultry.
sentences.chinese: 雞球蟲病是嚴重危害養禽業的一種寄生蟲病。

sentences.english: The lazy man was a parasite on his family.
sentences.chinese: 那懶漢是家裏的寄生蟲。

sentences.english: The disease is caused by the trypanosoma parasite.
sentences.chinese: 這種疾病是由某某寄生蟲引起的。

sentences.english: The virus came to the tulip from a louse living on peaches and potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 這些病毒來自於桃子和土豆上的一種寄生蟲。

sentences.english: Efforts are now focused on preventing the spread of the parasites.
sentences.chinese: 防控舉措如今集中在防止寄生蟲的傳播上。

sentences.english: Her relatives leeched her for her money like parasites.
sentences.chinese: 她的親戚像寄生蟲似地“榨取”她的錢財。

sentences.english: During the chronic phase, the parasites are hidden mainly in the heart and digestive muscle.
sentences.chinese: 在慢性期，寄生蟲主要隱藏在心臟和消化道的肌肉中。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the epidemic status of important human parasitosis in Shandong Province.
sentences.chinese: 目的掌握山東省人體重要寄生蟲病流行現狀。

sentences.english: The grouper is allowing the small cleaner wrasse into its mouth to clean off parasites.
sentences.chinese: 石斑魚允許小瀨魚進入口中清除寄生蟲。

sentences.english: Fear and greed expose the spaceship crew to an alien  parasite.
sentences.chinese: 恐懼和貪婪使太空船成員受到外星寄生蟲的威脅。

sentences.english: The strange thing is, they may have parasites to thank.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的是，入侵成功還得感謝寄生蟲的幫忙。

sentences.english: Eosinophils can increase with allergic reactions and with parasitic infestations.
sentences.chinese: 當過敏反應和寄生蟲感染時嗜酸性粒細胞會增多。

sentences.english: Enhanced resistance to infection by bacterial, viral, rickettsial and.
sentences.chinese: 外寄生蟲感染的抵抗力已有報道。

sentences.english: Density and distribution of rodents with the relationship of rodents and its ectoparasite are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並調查了鼠類分佈情況和寄生蟲與寄主的關係等。

definition: to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
rarity/rare delicacy/foreign matter/alien body/the dead/ghost/monstrosity/alien life-form
Asian swamp eel (Monopterus albus)/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
